question: You have recently started work in a new company.Write a letter to an English-speaking friend. In your letter:•	Explain why you changed jobs•	Describe your new job•	Tell him/her your other news
text: I was so glad to get a letter from you. I have not heard from you for a thousand years! How are you doing? Cannot forget how we hanged up on Cuba last year but it was my worst hangover ever.

I have the news for you. As you might remember I hated my last job with all my guts, so I finally changed it and find a job of my dream. I am working now in NeverSummer Snowboards as a sales manager and we are selling snowboards and apparel worldwide. So if you need a new board do not hesitate to ask me.

And I totally forget to tell you the main news! I am planning a marriage with Christina , so we are waiting for you at our wedding party on August the 1st, I will send you an invitation in the next letter. I hope that this letter will find you in a good health. Cannot wait for your answer!
